In the US, some universities offer undergraduate and graduate programs in food science, nutrition, and culinary arts. Some examples of universities with these programs include:

* University of California, Davis: Department of Food Science and Technology
* Cornell University: Department of Food Science
* University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign: Department of Food Science and Human Nutrition
* The Culinary Institute of America: Culinary Arts and Applied Food Studies
